bibl.title: Elkab and Beyond. Studies in Honour of Luc Limme. (Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 191.)
bibl.note: Pp. xv-xvi: Anne CAHEN-DELHAYE, Avant-propos; - xvii-xxiv: Bibliography of Luc Limme 1967-2008 [compiled by Wouter CLAES].
CLAES Wouter, Herman DE MEULENAERE and Stan HENDRICKX (Edd.), Elkab and Beyond. Studies in Honour of Luc Limme. (Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 191.)
Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, Peeters - Departement Oosterse Studies, 2009, 8°, xxviii-557 pp., 1 portrait en front., figg., pll. ISBN 978-90-429-2239-6. €89.
